thing.name: Changing Table
thing.text:
A Changing table with 3 drawers and a laundry basket.
The bottom panel sometimes comes loose (see picture).

thing.name: Table and 4 Chairs
thing.text:
A table with 4 chairs (only 2 seen in the pictures).
Table can be opened and extended (extensions stored under it).
Dimensions (without extension): Width 100cm, Height 74cm, Length 182cm

thing.name: Home Bundle (Blankets, Pillows, etc...)
thing.text:
"Welcome to Oxford" Home Bundle:
- The main part of the bundle is not in the pictures: Double wool duvet, Double summer blanket, Double duvet (very warm), Double duvet (medium-warmth), 2 excellent Single duvets, Single light duvet, 5 excellent pillows, 4 simple pillows, 3 bath mats.

- 1st picture: Bundle of sheets (mostly double, some single), and towels. (There are more not in the picture).
- 2nd picture: Laundry hamper and 2 vases.
- 3rd picture: Mirror
- 4th picture: Laundry basket
- 5th picture: Laundry rack.

thing.name: Mothercare Cot Bed with Mothercare Mattress
thing.text:
A Mothercare cot bed with a Mothercare mattress.
Dimensions: 61cm x 162cm, for standard 60x120 mattress.
We bought the mattress brand new, and used it for 1.5 years.
The cot bed is used, and the back panel has to be secured with zip ties. Other than that the cot bed is fine.
Can be dissembled and collected easily
Preferred collection after 16.5.2019.

thing.name: Bath Bundle: Bath + Swivel Bath Seat + Stool
thing.text:
A baby bath with non-slip strips.
A swivelling bath seat, with suction cups for attaching to bath floor.
A Step stool.

thing.name: Mamas and Papas Armadillo Pram
thing.text:
An "Armadillo" pushchair by Mamas and Papas.
Very light, folds easily (single handed), reclines to any angle between sitting and sleeping position.
Suitable from birth - 15kg
Comes with original rain cover, and in original its box.
Link to the model in Mamas and Papas

thing.name: Phil and Ted Cocoon
thing.text: Black Phil and Ted Cocoon in excellent condition.

thing.name: Toy Bundle
thing.text:
Big toy bundle, which includes:
- Car
- Table and chair
- Books (some brand new)
- Toys, some new and unopened

thing.name: Play Tent
thing.text: A Play Tent, in original bag. Hardly used and in perfect condition.

thing.name: Balance Bike
thing.text: Balance Bike, seat height can be adjusted.

thing.name: White Highchair
thing.text:
A white highchair.
The legs can be taken apart, so it's easy to collect.

thing.name: Blue Highchair
thing.text:
A blue highchair.
The legs can be taken apart, so it's easy to collect.
Preferred collection after 16.5.2019.

thing.name: RedKite Baby Carrier + Japanese Baby Sling
thing.text:
- RedKite baby carrier in original box, with instructions.
- A Japanese baby sling (never used). Very light. Comes with instructions on paper and on DVD.

thing.name: Hauck Sleep'n Play Travel Cot
thing.text: Bought new, and was only used once.

thing.name: Blender and Grinder
thing.text:
Tower 6-speed blender with a grinder.
Bought new, used mostly the grinder.

thing.name: Manual Food Chopper
thing.text:
BRIEFTONS QuickPull Food Chopper
In original box. Very handy!

thing.name: Chest of Drawers
thing.text:
A chest of drawers.
Dimensions: Width 80cm, Depth 48cm, Height 70cm.
The bottom of the top drawer cannot hold heavy weight, but it's usable for light things.

thing.name: Candy Tumble Dryer
thing.text:
Candy Condenser Tumble Dryer (model GCC 580NB-80) -- needs only electricity, not ventilation.
Load capacity: 9kg.
Dimensions: Height: 84cm, Width 59cm, Length 56cm.
Bought new two years ago, and was very well cared for.
Comes with original manual and warranty.
We are willing to participate in delivery expenses.

thing.name: Hand Blender and Chopper
thing.text: Breville hand blender and chopper. In original box.

thing.name: Kettle
thing.text: Cookworks electric kettle.

thing.name: DeLonghi 900W Combination Microwave
thing.text:
Delonghi 900W Combination Microwave, with Convection Oven and Grill (model D90B).
Capacity: 25L
Dimensions: Height 28cm, Width 48cm, Depth 42cm.
Bought new one year ago.
Note that it's big enough to fit a microwave baby bottle sterilizer
Link to microwave in Argos.

thing.name: Popcorn Machine
thing.text: GVC popcorn machine.

thing.name: Computer Screen
thing.text: ViewSonic 22" screen.

thing.name: Women Bicycle
thing.text:
GIANT Women bicycle, with mudguards, basket, and a kickstand.
21 gear (Shimano)
Includes an Oxford lock (with all original keys).

thing.name: Men Bicycle
thing.text:
Marin bicycle, with mudguards and a basket.
21 gear (Shimano)
Includes an Oxford lock (with all original keys).
Preferred collection after 24.5.2019.

thing.name: Hand Mixer
thing.text: A handheld mixer with mixing bowls.

thing.name: Food Containers
thing.text: Lots of plastic food containers.
